```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```

## Row 1

```{r, warning=FALSE}
p1 <- ggplot(data = starwars, aes(x = mass, y = height, text = name)) + 
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw() +
  scale_fill_viridis_d()

ggplotly(p1)
```

## Row 2 {.tabset}

```{r, warning=FALSE}
#| title: Bar Chart
b1 <- ggplot(data = starwars, aes(x = mass, y = height, text = name)) + 
  geom_bar(stat="identity")
theme(axis.title.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = .5, hjust = 1))

ggplotly(b1)
```

```{r}
#| title: Table
starwars <- starwars %>%
  select(name, height, mass, gender, homeworld, species)

knitr::kable(starwars)
```
